title: Quarkus 2.14.2.Final and 2.13.5.Final released - Fix for CVE-2022-4116
content: Today, we are announcing the release of Quarkus 2.14.2.Final and Quarkus 2.13.5.Final. Both releases fix CVE-2022-4116 which has been rated as severity high. This fix also hardens CORS handling, including changing 200 OK to 403 FORBIDDEN when a CORS request is rejected because of an invalid origin. It is highly...
